scripts.sync:fonts: mkdir -p ./public/fonts && cp ./node_modules/@fontsource/inter/files/inter-latin-400-normal.woff2 ./public/fonts/inter-latin-400.woff2 && cp ./node_modules/@fontsource/inter/files/inter-latin-600-normal.woff2 ./public/fonts/inter-latin-600.woff2 && cp ./node_modules/@fontsource/inter/files/inter-latin-700-normal.woff2 ./public/fonts/inter-latin-700.woff2 && cp ./node_modules/@fontsource/bebas-neue/files/bebas-neue-latin-400-normal.woff2 ./public/fonts/bebas-neue-latin-400.woff2 && cp ./node_modules/@fontsource/fira-code/files/fira-code-latin-400-normal.woff2 ./public/fonts/fira-code-latin-400.woff2 && cp ./node_modules/@fontsource/fira-code/files/fira-code-latin-500-normal.woff2 ./public/fonts/fira-code-latin-500.woff2 && cp ./node_modules/@fontsource/finger-paint/files/finger-paint-latin-400-normal.woff2 ./public/fonts/finger-paint-latin-400.woff2 && cp ./node_modules/@fontsource/cabin-sketch/files/cabin-sketch-latin-400-normal.woff2 ./public/fonts/cabin-sketch-latin-400.woff2 && cp ./node_modules/@fontsource/cabin-sketch/files/cabin-sketch-latin-700-normal.woff2 ./public/fonts/cabin-sketch-latin-700.woff2 && cp ./node_modules/@fontsource/schoolbell/files/schoolbell-latin-400-normal.woff2 ./public/fonts/schoolbell-latin-400.woff2
scripts.predev: npm run sync:gsap && npm run sync:fonts
scripts.prebuild: npm run sync:gsap && npm run sync:fonts
